availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Fadeley (Bath County, Kentucky, house and sign painter)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, house and sign painter. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Fadeley. Painter in Bath County, Kentucky in 1850. House and sign painter in Bath County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Division 2, p. 2A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 24.
